parameters: AlainFace
\n<Alain>I don't appreciate how deep inside her
body I have to wander to find these gems.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Mirie, I hope me moving around so
much is causing you some intestinal pain.
ChainCommand 1000 6 up,left,left,right,down,left
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Blasted! Time for a battle!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Just why do I have to fight inside
someone else's body? Mini is such a curse
for me...
Blackout
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Ngrk... Blasted... Fighting spirits
in a place like this? That's too tough...
Mirie_Default
\n<Mirie>...Hm... Alain has been in there for a while.
The defensive spell's about to wear off...
Mirie_Annoyed
\n<Mirie>Don't tell me he failed. I'll have to check when
I warp him out, but it's going to be pretty gross if
he's been digested.
MirieStomach
\n<Mirie>Hey, Alain. If you can hear me, give my stomach
a strike or something so I can tell you're there.
\n<Mirie>I guess being eaten was too much for him.
\n<Mirie>I was certain that the Omega Guard spell should've
been enough to protect him, but I suppose I ended up
overestimating his ability.
\n<Mirie>... I'll go grab a Revival Potion then...
Overpowered by the magic gems that the town alchemist
had eaten, Dragon Rider Alain was weakened and stalled
long enough for the Omega Guard spell to wear off.
Unable to survive inside Mirie's body without it, the
shrunken adventurer was digested and absorbed into the
alchemist's body with the rest of the food she'd eaten.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Alright. That should be all four of
the gems done.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>The question is, though... how do I
get out of here?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>That sounds like something just started
to activate. Has Mirie begun the warping
spell?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Don't tell me I have to look for a
portal or something...
The seal has been drawn on the gem.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Looks like this one got caught here.
I'll be doing Mirie a favor by getting it
out of her system.
ChainCommand 1000 6 x,x,z,z,x,z,x,z
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Tch! A monster in the gem!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Spirit Gems are valuable, I can see
why Mirie wanted these back.
Blackout
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Ngrk... Blasted... Fighting spirits
in a place like this? That's too tough...
Mirie_Default
\n<Mirie>...Hm... Alain has been in there for a while.
The defensive spell's about to wear off...
Mirie_Annoyed
\n<Mirie>Don't tell me he failed. I'll have to check when
I warp him out, but it's going to be pretty gross if
he's been digested.
MirieStomach
\n<Mirie>Hey, Alain. If you can hear me, give my stomach
a strike or something so I can tell you're there.
\n<Mirie>I guess being eaten was too much for him.
\n<Mirie>I was certain that the Omega Guard spell should've
been enough to protect him, but I suppose I ended up
overestimating his ability.
\n<Mirie>... I'll go grab a Revival Potion then...
Overpowered by the magic gems that the town alchemist
had eaten, Dragon Rider Alain was weakened and stalled
long enough for the Omega Guard spell to wear off.
Unable to survive inside Mirie's body without it, the
shrunken adventurer was digested and absorbed into the
alchemist's body with the rest of the food she'd eaten.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Alright. That should be all four of
the gems done.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>The question is, though... how do I
get out of here?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>That sounds like something just started
to activate. Has Mirie begun the warping
spell?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Don't tell me I have to look for a
portal or something...
The seal has been drawn on the gem.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Thank the Goddess that I don't have
to find another way out of here.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I've had enough of being inside somebody's
body for one day. And I do NOT want to
out in such a undignified way...
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Of course there's something else in here!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Mimic Parasites are only found inside
mimics. Mirie, how in the world did you
have one in your stomach?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Mirie, your eating habits might be as
bad as Gale's.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Alright. Time to warp out!
Blackout
Mirie_Happy
\n<Mirie>Okay. That looks like all of them. Thanks for
all of your hard work, Alain.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Please watch what you eat next time. I
don't want to have to go inside somebody's
stomach ever again.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Going around in a place where everything
around me trying to digest me is NOT
something I want to get used to.
Mirie_Default
\n<Mirie>Well, I considered asking you for a proper
report on what the inside of my stomach was like, but
I guess that'd be rude at this point.
\n<Mirie>At the very least, I've gotten enough data to
show that the Omega Guard spell works.
\n<Mirie>As a reward, I'll give you that skill tome.
Quest Completed
The gems were successfully warped out of Mirie's body!
Alain survived digestion thanks to the Omega Guard
skill cast on him!
Obtained Omega Guard Skill Tome!
Omega Guard is a skill that promotes tier 2 resistances
for defense and magic defense on a target!
Mirie's Eaten Gems Quest can be restarted by touching
her left foot!
Quest Set Completed 20
Blackout
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Ngrk... Blasted... Fighting spirits
in a place like this? That's too tough...
Mirie_Default
\n<Mirie>...Hm... Alain has been in there for a while.
The defensive spell's about to wear off...
Mirie_Annoyed
\n<Mirie>Don't tell me he failed. I'll have to check when
I warp him out, but it's going to be pretty gross if
he's been digested.

\n<Mirie>Hey, Alain. If you can hear me, give my stomach

\n<Mirie>I guess being eaten was too much for him.
\n<Mirie>I was certain that the Omega Guard spell should've
been enough to protect him, but I suppose I ended up
overestimating his ability.
\n<Mirie>... I'll go grab a Revival Potion then...
Overpowered by the magic gems that the town alchemist
had eaten, Dragon Rider Alain was weakened and stalled
long enough for the Omega Guard spell to wear off.
Unable to survive inside Mirie's body without it, the
shrunken adventurer was digested and absorbed into the
alchemist's body with the rest of the food she'd eaten.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>There might be a gem through here, but
something tells me that there isn't one.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>A portal out might be through here, but
something tells me that it isn't this way.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>This place... Do I really want to
head in here?
WARNING: Entering will result in a game over. There will
be no CGs. Only dialogue.
Yes
No
Yes
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Huh? Uwah! This area's contracting?
No wait! Blasted! It's pulling me in!
Blackout
Mirie_Default
\n<Mirie>Alain's been taking a while... I wonder if
something's happened.
Mirie_Annoyed
\n<Mirie>Urgh... Was that my stomach...? At a time like
this...? Talk about 'bad timing'.
\n<Mirie>Sorry, Alain. I'm going to run the little
alchemist's room for a bit.
(I really hope he's still in my stomach right now...)
\n<Mirie>Haaah... My stomach... Was eating gems THAT
bad of an idea?
Having gone too deep through Mirie's digestive system,
Dragon Rider Alain received a most foul and undignified
death.
Unable to fight the constricting power of Mirie's
intestines, the shrunken adventurer became mixed in
with her excrement.
No
HP and SP were fully recovered!
